ARABIC: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is your Lord who will gather them. He is All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your Lord will surely gather them together: Certainly He is all-wise and all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed your Lord will gather them all together. Surely He is All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord will resurrect them all; He is All-wise and All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed your Lord only will raise them all on the Day of Resurrection; indeed only He is Wise, All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, your Lord will gather them together. Truly, He is Most Wise, (and) Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely your Lord will gather them together; surely He is Wise, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and it is thy Lord shall muster them, and He is All-wise, All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thy Lord will gather them together. Lo! He is Wise, Aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is your Lord who will gather them. He is all wise and all knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And veriiy thy Lord! He will gather them, and verily He is Wise. Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed it is your Lord who will resurrect them. Indeed, He is all-wise, all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Assuredly it is thy Lord Who will gather them together: for He is perfect in Wisdom and Knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, your Lord will gather them together. Truly, He is All-Wise, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and it is your Lord who will gather them. He is Wise, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is your Lord who will gather them together. He is the Wise, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:25] And it is indeed your Lord Who will gather them, lo! He is Wise, in His actions, Knower, of His creatures.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! your Lord will gather them together) the former and the latter. (Lo! He is Wise) He decreed that they will be mustered, (Aware) of their mustering, reward and punishment.
